extendedInfo.description: Does your Android screen have evidence of screen burn-in?  Use this app to remove burn-in from your device's AMOLED or other display.  A sequence of primary colors is used to restore burned-out pixels.  Built for ICS and Jelly Bean, the sequence will run fullscreen so that the Navigation Bar is hidden.Recommended for Galaxy Nexus and similar devices.

reviews.title: Oooh Pretty Colors..But
reviews.comment: Well I installed this because my Galaxy Note has burn in from my car dock program. I let it run all night long, about Seven Hours, and in the morning, No Change! It\'s nice if you just want to stare at the changing colors, but it doesn\'t fix burn in. Only a new screen will fix that. Nice Try Though...
reviews.author: J Lester

reviews.title: FAKE
reviews.comment: dint do anything.. left it on for about 43hr straight anf nothing happened.   dont waste your time.
reviews.author: JAVi S.

reviews.title: Best on market
reviews.comment: this app is the best one on the market you can check pixels just like other apps, and remove burned pixels with automatic screen color changing i hoped more advanced options, but this is very good for free app
reviews.author: Seung Hun Kang

reviews.title: Not a cure for bad burnins
reviews.comment: I\'m gonna give this 2 stars for the effort though. I have a nasty burnin on my SG S2. I\'ve used this app about 3-4 hours a day for the last week and it seems the burnin is not that strong anymore or it might just be placebo or I\'ve been getting used to it. One thing\'s for sure: it\'s still there.
reviews.author: Cristian Dragos

reviews.title: Nice colors but does not fix
reviews.comment: The problem with the screen burn in only sending the phone back to Samsung will get it fixed this is a problem I did not notice until having a white background I can see a burned in image of the clock program that I have been using for 6 months nice. Nice it might work for others but not for Samsung
reviews.author: philmiami florida

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The screen on my Samsung s2 had very bad screen burn. I was told to download this app. I left it on over night and I have seen a major improvement. I couldn\'t believe it. I didn\'t think it was going to work.  Awesome.  Recommend to anyone with screen burn.
reviews.author: lesley mctear

reviews.title: Fixed
reviews.comment: I have a galaxy s2 with horizontal lines on the screen. I turned the brightness to max and let this run for two hours and it was fixed! Thanks dev
reviews.author: mehmeh mehh

reviews.title: Worked perfectly! Does what it says!
reviews.comment: This app worked perfectly for me, I had really bad burn-in on my HTC G2.  I left this running for 8 hours and the burn in was gone, my screen is like it never happened!  TIP:  Turn your brightness as low as possible, before starting the app, leave it alone and plugged in for at least 8 hours.  This works just like the break-in of a plasma turning the brightness up or leaving it on auto will diminish the results.
reviews.author: Khary Taylor

reviews.title: Nice app,  but......
reviews.comment: It does not seem to work though in fixing screen burn on my S4. Run it for  4hrs at full brightness and burn in still there.
reviews.author: herbert cambe

reviews.title: Worked great for my Nexus
reviews.comment: I think some of the issues people are having, is because they don\'t turn the screen to full brightness. I forgot, and it did nothing.. but when i turned brightness to max, it made the burn-in almost impossible to notice in about 3 hours. I use it about once a month for a touch-up, but its like a new screen!
reviews.author: Eric Stromberger

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: I used it for about 30 min and most burn in images were gone. Only the notification bar was there but not as noticeable.
reviews.author: Chris Sooree

reviews.title: 3 hours burn in reduced
reviews.comment: Left it on for three hours and it was reduced not gone. Gonna leave it on all night tonight I had it on low.
reviews.author: Poison Ivy

reviews.title: Did Not Work - Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: I let this app run for 5 minutes and there was no noticeable change in the minor screen burn in I had from browser page... If there is a specific time to allow this to run, it should be put in the app...
reviews.author: Andy F Az Biker

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Screen burn on my i9000 was fixed after running for about 15mins!! Perfect
reviews.author: Adam Hayward

reviews.title: Doesn\'t do a thing
reviews.comment: I have run this app for 24 hours straight with no change. My HTC One S has the car dock icons barely burnt into the screen. I will continue to run it, but so far it hasn\'t resolved my screen burn in.
reviews.author: Blayne Warwick

reviews.title: Can\'t believe it fixed my burn in :-)
reviews.comment: Thanks, people, it has really worked out. 5+ stars
reviews.author: Dalibor Puljiz

reviews.title: Rename the app and I\'ll give you 3 stars
reviews.comment: This did nothing for burn-in on my year old GS3. I let it run for 10 minutes and absolutely no change in menu button area of my phone.
reviews.author: terry joebgen

reviews.title: Remember to have the screen on 100
reviews.comment: Great, it really works
reviews.author: William Taylor

reviews.title: Still pants
reviews.comment: This one doesn\'t work either
reviews.author: Andy Frost

reviews.comment: Useless
reviews.author: Eldeeb M
